title: Can I use my phone as a mobile Wi-Fi hotspot and access the Internet from another device using my phone's data connection?
answer: Yes. Touch Settings > More > Wireless & networks > Tethering & portable hotspot > Portable Wi-Fi hotspot. After a device connects to your phone over Wi-Fi, you can access the Internet from that device using your phone's mobile data connection. [To set the hotspot name and encryption mode, go to Configure Wi-Fi hotspot.]()
